label: 女絵
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 2:  Heian Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1999
説明文: One type of Heian secular narrative emakimono that is closely associated with romances, kana diaries, an poem tales.  The oldest extant set of onnae scrolls is the Genji monogatari emaki (p. 413). [絵巻物、源氏物語絵巻]
